annotations.description: The Planter's Punch is the foundational formula for a great number of Tiki Drinks, but it's also got its roots in oppression, genocide and slavery. *********...
annotations.title: Planter's Punch | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz Lime Juice
.75 oz Demerara Syrup
.25 oz AllSpice Dram
3 oz Jamaica Rum
Two Dashes Angostura Bitters

Shake over ice
open pour
garnish with mint

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oH7PP_lV6J8
title: Planter's Punch
